page.title: 05The Desford Lane Peddlers
page.content: In Ratby there is a club called the Desford Peddlers. They collect vintage bikes. The most interesting bikes they have are the Bone-shaker, the Quadrant, and the Penny-farthing. The Quadrant has 3 wheels and it is very easy to get onto. The Penny-farthing is not so easy to get onto. It has a big wheel at the front and a small wheel at the back. The Bone-shaker is made completely out of wood and when it moves it really shakes because its tyres are made out of wood as well. The group also collect the old lamps that used to go on the bikes. These used to work by oil or candle or carbide. Carbide gives of a gas when water is dripped onto it and then you light the gas with a match. The lamps have green and red glass at aech side. The group ride and display the bikes all over the world.{Robbie
